entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Powell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Powell River Airport 07:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to flurries this morning. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
